ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | expcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | sqrecd.1 | |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 3 |  | expclzd.3 | |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | #P_expp1z | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A ^ ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( A ^ N ) x. A ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( A ^ ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( A ^ N ) x. A ) ) |
